1.content: Which characters would you inflate?
1.title: PB&J Otter

info.brief_description: PB&J Otter and friends get too "playful"
info.description:
The Lake Hoohaw residents have something cartoony going on.

Rules:
Couple rules:

No blood/guts
No death
No cussing or toliet humor
PB&J Otter characters are involved only, though they could reference other media
No OCs
No human transformation
Nothing involving the butt or the private parts
No sex except for french kissing, that is acceptable
Have fun
